description: A custom-built content management system based on git. (It powers this site!)
High performance TCP Proxy and Port Tunneling over WebSockets.
Musii is an alternative music bot to large public bots like Rythm or Groovy. It is a private, customizable bot that suits your needs.
An advanced emoji paste pad for people who don't want to pay for Discord Nitro.
Offline Judge is an advanced and configurable fast/slow grader that runs on your own computer!

JourneyRoute is a path-finding mod for Minecraft. With JourneyRoute, you will never get lost down a mineshaft! As you travel in a world, it will build a network of all the places you have been, and is able to generate routes between locations.

MissileWarsX (or MwX) is an open source implementation of the legendary MissileWars mini-game created by SethBling and Cubehamster. This plugin offers a refined experience that is true to the original game. MwX enables other tweaks & performance options that make the game more enjoyable.
Clockwork is an easy to use Task Scheduler library that reduces a lot of boilerplate code.

GitRCFS offers a lightweight option to synchronize an application's configuration & data files with a remote git repository. This library provides a simple api to use a git repository to access readonly configuration files.
WStream offers a simple and high-performance WebSocket stream built on top of Kestrel. It targets .NET Standard 2.0, as well as .NET Core 3.1 and above.
Tetrix is a small school project that implements a simplified version of Tetris on the Arduino Platform, using an LED Matrix.
A quick and easy proxy scraper!
A Memory Game built on the Arduino Platform. Project made for TEJ4M.
